name: Xadium
overview: Xadium has you controlling a spacecraft over the surface of a planet and underground through a network of tunnels. The first part has you viewing your craft from a 3rd person perspective and you must move left or right through gates that come towards you. You also have the ability to accelerate and brake and the gates must be completed before a clock runs out. If you hit or miss a gate then the clock decreases. The second part sees you view your craft from the side as you move through a network of tunnels looking for the exit before the clock runs out. You also have the ability to shoot any obstacles in your way.
